elements.name: Complete E2E Integration Test for User Profile Update

steps.name: Generate OTP Payload with phone number "8080808001"
user calls "Generate_OTP" with "POST" http request
the API call got success with status code 201
capture phone number from response
Generate Verify Payload with phone number "8080808001"
user calls "Verify_OTP" with "POST" http request
the API call got success with status code 200
extract auth token from response
Generate Update User Profile Payload with name "Ravi"
the user sends a POST request to "Update_User_Profile" with header as "Authorization"
the Update User Profile API call should succeed with status code 200 or 201
"user_profile.first_name" in response body is "Ravi"
user profile user_id in response body matches the dynamic user_id
Generate Update User Location Payload
the user sends a POST request to "Update_user_location" with header as "Authorization"
the API call got success with status code 200
"user_profile.lat" in response body should not be null or empty
"user_profile.long" in response body should not be null or empty
"user_profile.geography_level2_name" in response body should not be null or empty
Generate Verify Referral Code Payload with code "9090909011"
the user sends a POST request to "Verify_Referral_Code" with header as "Authorization"
the referral code API call should succeed or be already used
"message" in response body is "You are mapped to your referrer successfully"

arguments.val: "You are mapped to your referrer successfully"

steps.name: print user summary

name: Update User Profile API Testing
description:
As a mobile app user
  I want to test the complete user profile update flow
  So that I can verify all APIs work correctly
